> Thanks for your reply. I'm testing the following things:
> 1. How the client collects the parameters that need to be sent the 
> server

Make XPath assertions against the generated markup before it is sent 
to the server.


> 2. How the server responds to the request.  

Don't use the client to test the server. Instrument the server to 
respond synchronously. If there is a complicated backend system 
generating the results behind the server get the server out of the 
way to test /that/. Either way the chunk you're testing now is too big.

cheers
Bill
